cause.description:
WiserEarth (www.WiserEarth.org) is an online community space addressing the central issues of our day: climate change, poverty, the environment, peace, water, hunger, social justice, conservation, human rights, and more.
1. it is important that we connect and collaborate to move towards a just and sustainable world
2. Content is created by people like you from around the world
cause.mission: We are connecting the global movement working towards social justice, environmental restoration and sustainability
cause.name: WiserEarth
